name: DoubleResetDetector_Generic
keywords: device, control, eeprom, flashstorage-samd, flashstorage-stm32, flashstorage-rtl8720, rpi-pico, rp2040, raspberry-pico, nano-rp2040-connect, teensy, sam-due, samd, stm32, nRF52, double-reset, flashstorage, dueflashstorage, littlefs, spiffs, multi-reset, reset, detector, data
description: Library to detect a double reset, using EEPROM, DueFlashStorage, FlashStorage_SAMD, FlashStorage_RTL8720, FlashStorage_STM32 or LittleFS/InternalFS. For AVR, Teensy, SAM DUE, SAMD, STM32F/L/H/G/WB/MP1, nRF52, RP2040-based Nano_RP2040_Connect, RASPBERRY_PI_PICO, RTL8720DN, etc. boards. Now using efficient FlashStorage_STM32 library and supporting new RP2040-based Nano_RP2040_Connect, RASPBERRY_PI_PICO and STM32 core v2.0.0
